@x_u_x I'll give you that! Though even NTR lite. From how he said it (from leaving the note for the Bullies to raping her) he easily figured it out (how you described). The sad part in the end was the emptiness of his revenge which was fitting. Yeah he got his secret spot back (from her polluting it with her using it as HER secret spot to fuck her boyfriend) but the time they spent together, those "good feelings he had "we'll never go away!" This is what people who are use to being alone fear about getting into a relationship! that it "won't work out" and they'll be left in a state of "withdrawal" (hard to enjoy something when you ). I see it as justifiable punishment for what he did (not taking her side! But I figure there were better more ethical ways to get the skank and her man to fuck off along with the bullies! He'd still be hit with the loneliness, but at least he wouldn't be in the state he's in (still likely but not as pitiful as you see in the end). Oh well that's how it goes

I LIKE IT

But on a note, I do love the ending being a downer! While what he did was fucked up! Everything was more of self defense since she DID invade his safe space, and DID violate the major rule about revealing it to others (she had alot of nerve playing with him till she was "done" and having the nerve to as pointed before bring her ex to fuck under there. I knew the first time she saw him. But likely didn't care having pegged him as harmless before! So the gangrape and personal rape along with being abandoned is Karmic). I will say He really should get rid of that blackmail video! Not in the way the assholes can retaliate without it! But not bother looking at it even for a wank! She brought out the worst in him and if he wants to recover, he needs to distance ANYTHING to do with her! (As for her...I feel nothing, her fate of trauma and abandonment is a well deserved fate, hopefully she'll think twice about playing around with people! She and Shouta "Deserved each other!" LOL)

I'd have to give it to the girl as the biggest shit in the story! Her look of horror when he made clear he was going to rape her was brilliant since I can guess she pegged him as "harmless" since the day they met! He took what she promised and made clear "never show herself again".
Now she's got trauma AND I doubt she and her boyfriend "Shota" will stay together (Cheater on her, then abandoned her to get raped to save himself). Maybe that will teach her to not manipulate other people's feelings (Plus, she was willing to take back a dude who cheated on her and as shown was still of poor character. Maybe that will also teach her that thinking with your crotch will get you consequences akin to "EMERGENCE!").
Also "Kaeltalas" there's a reason this story doesn't have the NTR tag on it! They were never together, there was never a chance of them being together! I see this more of "Teaching a THOT a proper lesson for playing with people's goodwill and feelings!"

It is a 7/10 although I did not like the NTR, at least the male MC did something as a revenge and even fucked the female MC that he always wanted to do. I liked the plot-twist near the end since it was unexpected but a satisfying "fuck you" to the face.
